metadata.name: Janitz 1
metadata.description:
**Artist** [Iaiowski](https://instagram.com/iaiowski) (visual) & [Jack Fresia](https://instagram.com/jack_fresia) (music)
**Title** Janitz 1 
**Art type** Digital painting with original audio track 
**Resolution** 3840px x 2160px, 4K
**Format** MP4
 
This unique collaboration is a visual representation of the music.
 
The artwork is a 57 seconds video of a digital painting and an original audio track made specifically for this project. This NFT also includes TIFF + WAV files (the files are sent to an email address of your choice). 
 
If you decide to purchase the whole collection, you will be pleased to know that both the visuals and the audio can be stitched together to make a audiovisual artwork piece of 11520px X 2160px with a 2m51s audio track
 
*Due to the environmental footprint of NFTs, we have used the services of [treedom.net](https://www.treedom.net) to offset the carbon footprint of this project. This project is 100% carbon neutral.
